verses.plain: My breath is corrupt, my days are extinct, the graves are ready for me.

tokens.t: My breath is corrupt, my days are extinct, the graves
for me.

verses.plain: Are there not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation?

tokens.t: not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation?

verses.plain: Lay down now, put me in a surety with thee; who is he that will strike hands with me?

tokens.t: Lay down now, put me in a surety with thee; who
he
will strike hands with me?

verses.plain: For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt them.

tokens.t: For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt

verses.plain: He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.

tokens.t: He that speaketh flattery to
friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.

verses.plain: He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret.

tokens.t: He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret.

verses.plain: Mine eye also is dim by reason of sorrow, and all my members are as a shadow.

tokens.t: Mine eye also is dim by reason of sorrow, and all my members
as a shadow.

verses.plain: Upright men shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.

tokens.t: Upright
shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.

verses.plain: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.

tokens.t: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.

verses.plain: But as for you all, do ye return, and come now: for I cannot find one wise man among you.

tokens.t: But as for you all, do ye return, and come now: for I cannot find
wise
among you.

verses.plain: My days are past, my purposes are broken off, even the thoughts of my heart.

tokens.t: My days are past, my purposes are broken off,
the thoughts of my heart.

verses.plain: They change the night into day: the light is short because of darkness.

tokens.t: They change the night into day: the light
short because of darkness.

verses.plain: If I wait, the grave is mine house: I have made my bed in the darkness.

tokens.t: If I wait, the grave
mine house: I have made my bed in the darkness.

verses.plain: I have said to corruption, Thou art my father: to the worm, Thou art my mother, and my sister.

tokens.t: I have said to corruption, Thou
my father: to the worm,
my mother, and my sister.

verses.plain: And where is now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?

tokens.t: And where
now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?

verses.plain: They shall go down to the bars of the pit, when our rest together is in the dust.

tokens.t: They shall go down to the bars of the pit, when
rest together
in the dust.
